articles.title: Tyler Perry causes chaos as people wait 16 hours for one of 5,000 free Thanksgiving turkeys - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tyler Perry, the 51-year-old actor and film studio owner, put his $1 billion fortune to good use on Sunday with a giveaway of 5,000 food parcels for Thanksgiving from his Atlanta studio.
articles.content: Atlanta's roads were snarled with traffic on Sunday as people waited for up to 16 hours in their cars to claim a free box of Thanksgiving food donated by billionaire actor and film studio owner Tyler… [+5596 chars]
